mapper.insert: insert into sys_dept (dept_name, parent_id, enable_, sort_no, leaf_, remark_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sys_dept set dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leaf_ = #{leaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, dept_name, parent_id, enable_, sort_no, leaf_, remark_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from sys_dept where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id_, dept_name, parent_id, enable_, sort_no, leaf_, remark_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from sys_dept
